title: How to start contacting companies for sponsorship - Quora

response.answer_text: It comes down to 3 steps: Have the data Construct a narrative from the data Contact companies that can benefit from that narrative Companies and organizations will spend money on platforms for usually 1 of 3 reasons. They are looking for a platform that will directly lead to salesThey have a larger strategic corporate objectiveThey are looking to repair their brandIn order to gain any value in any these paths they need to know who you are, who is coming to your site, and as much demographic and sociographic data as possible. For numbers as small as ~1000 visits/day they need to have good reason for believing that there will be conversion in order to justify the expense and time. Find what your website can offer advertisers and sell them on the benefits with the data.
